name: Aasimar
description: Aasimar bear within their souls the light of the heavens, granting them celestial power and a touch of the divine.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Celestial Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to Necrotic damage and Radiant damage.

traits.name: Healing Hands
traits.description: As a Magic action, you touch a creature and roll a number of d4s equal to your Proficiency Bonus. The creature regains hit points equal to the total. Once per Long Rest.

features.name: Light Bearer
features.description: You know the Light cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

list.name: Light
list.description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

features.name: Celestial Revelation
features.description: Starting at 3rd level, as a Bonus Action you transform for 1 minute (once per Long Rest). Choose: Heavenly Wings (Fly Speed = Speed, extra Radiant damage = Prof Bonus), Inner Radiance (shed bright light 10 ft, Radiant damage to nearby creatures = Prof Bonus), or Necrotic Shroud (CHA save or Frightened, extra Necrotic damage = Prof Bonus).
